roleset.name: convert
roleset.note: PROSELYTIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'proselytize' based on survey of sentences in ectb. No verbnet entry. Based frames on 'convert' and 'urge'. (from proselytize.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: new faith, party, institution, or cause

example.text: The biggest challenge is how-9 * not to proselytize *T*-9.
John proselytized Mary on the virtues of downhill skiing.
example.arg: on the virtues of downhill skiing
